Name: Maia
description:
Maia is 52 years old and lives in the Baghdati district with her husband, grown son, daughter-in-law and granddaughter. Maiaâ€™s husband works at the local cleaning company and gets a small monthly salary. Maia runs a small-scale agricultural business, growing various vegetables on the family-owned plot of land. She works hard, but the family earnings are not enough for covering daily expenditures. 

Maia applied for credit for starting a car wash with her business partner. She will purchase essential equipment and a vacuum cleaner. Her son will help her run the business. They will provide services to local community members and hope to increase the monthly income of the family. Her new business initiative will generate income and significantly improve the living conditions of her family.
